verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of your \w habitations|strong="H4186"\w*, which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto you,

And will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* an offering by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, or a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* in \w performing|strong="H6381"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, or in a freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w*, or in your solemn \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, of the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, or of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*:  +  r 15.3  t performing: Heb. separating *

Then shall he that \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of a tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

And the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* for a drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* shalt thou \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* with the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* or \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*.

Or for a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, thou shalt \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \add for\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

And for a drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* thou shalt \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \add for\add* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And when thou \w preparest|strong="H6213"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H1121"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, or \add for\add* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* in \w performing|strong="H6381"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, or peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Then shall he \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* with a \w bullock|strong="H1241"\w* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w half|strong="H2677"\w* an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* for a drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \add for\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w*, or for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, or for a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, or a \w kid|strong="H5795"\w*.

According to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* that ye shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w*, \w so|strong="H3602"\w* shall ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to every \w one|strong="H0259"\w* according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*.

All that are born of the \w country|strong="H0249"\w* shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* these things after this manner, in \w offering|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And if a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* with you, or whosoever \add be\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you in your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*, and will \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; as ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, so he shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* \add shall be both\add* for you of the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*, and also for the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \add with you\add*, an \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* in your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*: as ye \add are\add*, so shall the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* be \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* shall be for you, and for the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* with you.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you,

Then it shall be, that, when ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, ye shall offer \w up|strong="H7311"\w* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Ye shall offer \w up|strong="H7311"\w* a \w cake|strong="H2471"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of your \w dough|strong="H6182"\w* \add for\add* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*: as \add ye do\add* the heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w*, so shall ye \w heave|strong="H7311"\w* it.

Of the \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of your \w dough|strong="H6182"\w* ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* in your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

¶ And if ye have \w erred|strong="H7686"\w*, and not \w observed|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\add Even\add* all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \add Moses\add*, and \w henceforward|strong="H1973"\w* among your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*;

Then it shall be, if \add ought\add* be \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* by \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w* without the \w knowledge|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, that all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*, according to the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 15.24 \ft without…: Heb. from the eyes\f*\f + \fr 15.24 \ft manner: or, ordinance\f*

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* them; for it \add is\add* \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*: and they shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* their \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and their sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, for their \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*:

And it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them; seeing all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add were\add* in \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*.

¶ And if \w any|strong="H0259"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* through \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*, then he shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* a she \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1323"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that sinneth \w ignorantly|strong="H7683"\w*, when he \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w* by \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him; and it shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.

Ye shall have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* for him that \w sinneth|strong="H6213"\w* through \w ignorance|strong="H7684"\w*, \add both for\add* him that is \w born|strong="H0249"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and for the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.\f + \fr 15.29 \ft sinneth: Heb. doth\f*

¶ But the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \add ought\add* \w presumptuously|strong="H7311"\w*, \add whether he be\add* born in the \w land|strong="H0249"\w*, or a \w stranger|strong="H4480"\w*, the same \w reproacheth|strong="H1442"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 15.30 \ft presumptuously: Heb. with an high hand\f*

Because he hath \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and hath \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* his \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w utterly|strong="H3772"\w* be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*; his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \add shall be\add* upon him.

¶ And while the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w gathered|strong="H7197"\w* \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w* upon the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And they that \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him \w gathering|strong="H7197"\w* \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* him unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.
And they \w put|strong="H3240"\w* him in \w ward|strong="H4929"\w*, because it was not \w declared|strong="H6567"\w* what should be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to him.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, The \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall be \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* him \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w bid|strong="H0559"\w* them that they \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them \w fringes|strong="H6734"\w* in the \w borders|strong="H3671"\w* of their \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* throughout their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*, and that they \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon the \w fringe|strong="H6734"\w* of the \w borders|strong="H3671"\w* a \w ribband|strong="H6616"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*:

And it shall be unto you for a \w fringe|strong="H6734"\w*, that ye may \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon it, and \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them; and that ye \w seek|strong="H8446"\w* not \w after|strong="H0310"\w* your own \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and your own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* which ye use to go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w*:

That ye may \w remember|strong="H2142"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
